channel.title: Comments on: IdeaJam wins 2009 Beacon Award

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>Congratulations to you both!! The hard work/long hours/brain scrambling do have their rewards</p>
item.content:encoded: Congratulations to you both!! The hard work/long hours/brain scrambling do have their rewards

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>@Lars, Thanks for pointing out my appalling spelling, it has been corrected.</p>
item.content:encoded: @Lars, Thanks for pointing out my appalling spelling, it has been corrected.

item.title: By: Lars Olufsen
item.dc:creator: Lars Olufsen
item.description: <p>Congratulations, Matt. It's an awesome product that deserves all the praise and awards you've got room for!</p><p>Point-deduction for misspelling Palmisano as Palmasino, though ;-)</p>
item.content:encoded:
Congratulations, Matt. It’s an awesome product that deserves all the praise and awards you’ve got room for!
